Class InfoBoxes

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Battle
          InfoBoxes

public class InfoBoxes
extends Battle

The InfoBoxes class, to allow drawing of various text on boxes to be displayed.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Hillier

displayText

public void displayText(java.lang.String text,
                        boolean keyToExit,
                        boolean toRemove)
Displays text.

Parameters:
text - The text to be displayed.
keyToExit - Whether or not the user has to press a button to continue from the text.
toRemove - Whether or not the box removes itself after displaying the text.

Draws the status bar.

Parameters:
type - The type of bar.
x - The X coordinate of the bar to be drawn.
y - The Y coordinate of the bar to be drawn.
barLength - The length of the bar to be drawn.
barHeight - The height of the bar to be drawn.
currentNum - The current length of the bar to be drawn.
maxNum - The maximum length of the bar to be drawn.
